subject: Re: [junit] WebBased Testing using JUNIT
msgSnippet: ... Yes. Either write HTTPUnit yourself, or try HtmlUnit. Google will help you find it. Good luck. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
love wrote:

> Can I do Web Based testing on say, "http://lava:8081/mypage" by using
> JUNIT to click my JSP buttons, fill in texts, ...
> and not using httpunit?

Yes. Either write HTTPUnit yourself, or try HtmlUnit. Google will help
you find it.

Good luck.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
